description: Enterprise techniques used by httpclient, ATT&CK software S0068 v1.1
name: httpclient (S0068)

techniques.comment: [httpclient](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0068) uses HTTP for command and control.(Citation: CrowdStrike Putter Panda)
[httpclient](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0068) opens cmd.exe on the victim.(Citation: CrowdStrike Putter Panda)
[httpclient](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0068) encrypts C2 content with XOR using a single byte, 0x12.(Citation: CrowdStrike Putter Panda)
